name: Mercury
description: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun and due to its proximity it is not easily seen except during twilight.

name: Venus
description: Venus is the second planet from the Sun and is the second brightest object in the night sky after the Moon.

name: Earth
description: Earth is the third planet from the Sun and is the largest of the terrestrial planets.

name: Mars
description: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun and is the second smallest planet in the solar system.

name: Jupiter
description: The planet Jupiter is the fifth planet out from the Sun.

name: Saturn
description: Saturn is the sixth planet from the Sun and the most distant that can be seen with the naked eye.

name: Uranus
description: Uranus is the seventh planet from the Sun. While being visible to the naked eye.

name: Neptune
description: Neptune is the eighth planet from the Sun making it the most distant in the solar system.
